backup_description: Episode and series backup before restoration

series.title: Bonanza
series.description: The Wild West adventures of Ben Cartwright and his sons as they run and defend their Nevada ranch while helping the surrounding community.

series.title: Count Duckula
series.description: The misadventures of a vegetarian vampire duck and his servants.

series.title: Count of Monte Cristo
series.description: Falsely imprisoned, Edmond Dantes encounters an inmate with knowledge of a hidden treasure. After escaping, he seeks the fortune to avenge his unjust incarceration.

series.title: Dragnet
series.description: Police Detective Sgt. Joe Friday and his partners investigate crimes in Los Angeles.

series.title: Ghost Squad
series.description: The adventures of the agents of Scotland Yard's secret undercover crime unit, dubbed "The Ghost Squad".

series.title: Long Ranger
series.description: The adventures of the masked Texas Ranger and his Native American partner.

series.title: Longstreet
series.description: The cases of a blind insurance investigator.

series.title: Man With a Camera
series.description: Former combat cameraman Mike Kovac is now freelance photographer in New York City, specializing in dangerous assignments others shy away from.

series.title: Marlowe
series.description: A crime series, featuring the cases of the fictional detective Philip Marlowe.

series.title: Mike Hammer
series.description: The adventures of Mickey Spillane's tough-talking, brawling, skirt-chasing private detective Mike Hammer, who's always ready to use his fists on a "mug" or his charm on a "skirt" to get the case solved.

series.title: Petrocelli
series.description: A Harvard-educated lawyer from Boston sets up shop in a small Arizona town.

series.title: The Adventures of Commando Cody
series.description: Dangerous climate changes are ravaging Earth and the U.S. government requests an investigation by masked super-scientist Commando Cody. He discovers that the disasters are being caused by space-alien forces from unknown planetary origins

series.title: William Tell
series.description: Depicts the legend of William Tell, who, as the stories say, shot an apple off of his son's head and lead the rebellion to free Switzerland.

episodes.title: Music To Die By
episodes.description: Mike Hammer investigates a murder in the music industry.

episodes.title: The New York Rock
episodes.description: A rock star's life is in danger and Mike Hammer is on the case.

episodes.title: Shots in the Dark
episodes.description: A photographer is murdered and Hammer must find the killer.

episodes.title: The Girl in the Red Bikini
episodes.description: A mysterious woman in a red bikini draws Hammer into a deadly plot.

episodes.title: My Fair Deadly
episodes.description: Mike Hammer investigates a case involving a deadly fair.

episodes.title: Eyewitness
episodes.description: A photographer captures evidence of a crime.

episodes.title: The Man with Delicate Hands
episodes.description: A man is burned to death in an apparent car accident but his sister knows it is not the man claimed because the body does not have delicate hands. Her brother is being tortured nearby to get information that can be used on Insider trading to make money on planned currency devaluations. Boss Henry Dickinson sends Miller on the case.

episodes.title: The Menacing Mazurka
episodes.description: Miller is a publicity agent to keep an eye on the (Moscow) Bassrai State Dancers visit to London. A dancer wants to defect but Miller is suspicious of her. The visit is being used to try and return a Colonel  who defected to Britain years earlier.

episodes.title: The Last Jump
episodes.description: Miller and Stock join a parachute regiment where someone is killing paras and using its West Germany jumps to pass equipment to East Germany. Miller calls Carter: "Porridge" 3 times.

episodes.title: Ticket for Blackmail
episodes.description: An exclusive tour of France run by two brothers is a front for a con game, blackmail and murder. When Craig is in trouble with the French police, his boss denies knowledge of him.

episodes.title: The Mission
episodes.description: Hoss helps an army troop transport gold, but the troop’s former scout plans to steal it.

episodes.title: Feet of Clay
episodes.description: The Cartwrights look after a young boy whose mother has just died, but the boy’s convict father has other ideas.

episodes.title: Silent Thunder
episodes.description: Little Joe teaches a deaf- mute mountain girl sign language, and mistakes his kindness for love.

episodes.title: Day of Reckoning
episodes.description: Ben gives an Indian couple some land to start a farm after they save his life, but a racist neighbor makes trouble.

episodes.title: San Francisco
episodes.description: After a long cattle drive, Ben, Hoss and Little Joe visit San Francisco. Their ranch hands and Ben soon disappear.

episodes.title: The Last Trophy
episodes.description: Adam leads two old friends on a hunting trip, but they are taken captive by a renegade Indian band.

episodes.title: The Hopefuls
episodes.description: While in Virginia City Adam meets and fall in love with a Quaker girl. He accompanies her wagon train west but is faced with action that offends her morals.

episodes.title: Denver McKee
episodes.description: The Cartwrights investigate a series of killings and robberies at nearby mines with the help of neighbor Denver McKee and his daughter.

episodes.title: The Stranger
episodes.description:
Ben plans to be the first governor of Nevada when a police inspector arrives with a
warrant for his arrest for a murder 20 years ago.

episodes.title: The Spanish Grant
episodes.description: A Spanish heiress arrives to claim land under The Spanish Land Grant and part is on the Ponderosa.

episodes.title: The Trail Gang
episodes.description: Ben and Hoss are herding cattle home when they run across a town that won’t let them through.

episodes.title: The Savage
episodes.description: Adam comes across a white woman living as an Indian. She nurses him to health when he is wounded and he falls in love.

episodes.title: The Showdown
episodes.description: The Cartwrights unknowingly hire a bank robber to work at the Ponderosa. Only Joe is suspicious.

content.title: A Christmas Wish
content.description: A charming and wholesome 1950 holiday film about a New York family (led by Durante) who are down on their luck at Christmas time.

content.title: Beat the Devil
content.description: On their way to Africa are a group of rogues who hope to get rich there, and a seemingly innocent British couple.

content.title: Beyond Christmas
content.description: Three benevolent spirits work behind the scenes to ensure that a young couple, who they met at Christmas, will find a way to be together and have a love that will last forever.

content.title: Black Brigade
content.description: A racist officer is put in charge of a squad of black troops charged with taking an important bridge from the Germans.

content.title: Brother from Another Planet
content.description: A mute alien with the appearance of a black human is chased by outer-space bounty hunters through the streets of Harlem.

content.title: Captain Kidd
content.description: The unhistorical adventures of pirate Captain Kidd revolve around treasure and treachery.

content.title: Captain Scarlett
content.description: Post-Napoleonic Wars, Scarlett returns to southern France. He rescues a princess from a forced marriage, defends locals from the Duke of Corlais' persecution, and ultimately overthrows the Duke's oppressive rule.

content.title: Carnival of Souls
content.description: A classic horror film about a woman who is haunted by strange visions after a car accident.

content.title: Charade
content.description: A romantic comedy mystery involving murder, romance, and Parisian intrigue.

content.title: Chinese Hercules
content.description: A martial arts fighter, haunted by his past, takes a job as a dock worker in a small village.

content.title: Cosmos
content.description: Captain Alex Hamilton investigates a strange signal on Earth and a UFO above Antarctica, discovering a giant robot enslaving humanoids and observing Earth from an unknown planet.

content.title: Creature
content.description: Married woman miscarries after dog attack. Vacation helps her bond with stray dog of same breed.

content.title: Curse of the Aztec Mummy
content.description: The evil Dr. Krupp, once again trying to get possession of the Aztec princess Xochitl's jewels, hypnotizes her current reincarnation, Flor, to get her to reveal the jewels' location - Xochitl's tomb.

content.title: Dementia-13
content.description: A scheming widow hatches a bold plan to acquire her late husband's inheritance, unaware that she is being targeted by an ax murderer who lurks in the family's estate.

content.title: Dick Tracy
content.description: Police detective Dick Tracy must identify and apprehend a serial killer known as Splitface.

content.title: Dragon Young Master
content.description: A fighter teams up with the daughter of the man who killed his father in 1920s Manchuria.

content.title: Duel in the Sun
content.description: Beautiful, biracial Pearl Chavez becomes the ward of her dead father's first love and finds herself torn between two brothers, one good and the other bad.

content.title: Flight to Mars
content.description: Five astronauts successfully fly to Mars where they encounter seemingly friendly and advanced inhabitants who harbor covert plans to use their ship to invade Earth.

content.title: Frederick Douglass
content.description: In 1872 in a church in Ohio, former slave Frederick Douglass shares his breathtaking journey from slavery to life as a statesman.

content.title: Get Christie Love
content.description: A tough undercover cop takes on the criminal underworld in this action-packed drama.

content.title: Get the Sheriff
content.description: A rape case opens racial divisions in a small town. A black sheriff and his white deputy investigate allegations that a white businessman raped a black college student.

content.title: Hell in Normandy
content.description: a well-meaning war film with a good premise and enough good acting, suspense and violent action to keep it entertaining.

content.title: Hercules Against the Moon Men
content.description: Hercules is summoned to oppose the evil Queen Samara, who has allied herself with aliens and is sacrificing her own people in a bid to awaken a moon goddess.

content.title: Hercules in the Haunted World
content.description: Hercules must journey into Hades itself to retrieve the magic stone that will free his love from the powers of darkness.

content.title: House on Haunted Hill
content.description: A millionaire offers $10,000 to five people who agree to be locked in a large, spooky, rented house overnight with him and his wife.

content.title: Jackie Robinson
content.description: Biography of Jackie Robinson, the first black major league baseball player in the 20th century. Traces his career in the negro leagues and the major leagues.

content.title: Jesse Owens
content.description: The full story of Jesse Owens, four-time Olympic gold medallist and star of the 1936 Berlin Olympics, as told through the lens of an investigator into Owen’s life at the behest of a judicial mandate. Here we see Owens forced to battle overt and covert racism throughout his life and his battling through difficulties.

content.title: Joe Bullett
content.description: Joe Bullett is called in to stop a gangster from sabotaging a soccer match.

content.title: Joshua Black Rider
content.description: A black soldier returns from fighting for the Union in the Civil War only to find out that his mother has been murdered by a gang of white thugs.

content.title: KC Confidential
content.description: An ex-con trying to go straight is framed for a million dollar armored car robbery and must go to Mexico in order to unmask the real culprits.

content.title: Lady Frankenstein
content.description: Baron Frankenstein's daughter and his assistant/her lover continue his experiments in an attempt to rebuild his legacy after he is killed by his psychotic, murderous first monster.

content.title: Legend of the Eight Samurai
content.description: Princess Shizu was born under a terrible curse. Only the eight legendary samurai, hailing from across Japan, can protect her from an ancient supernatural clan to fulfill their destinies as foretold by prophecy.

content.title: Little Lord Fauntleroy
content.description: An American boy turns out to be the long-lost heir of a British fortune. He is sent to live with the cold and unsentimental Lord, who oversees the trust.

content.title: Little Shop of Horrors
content.description: A farce about a florist's assistant who cultivates a plant that feeds on human blood.

content.title: Lola Colt
content.description: A mysterious woman gunslinger rides into a troubled western town and changes its fate.

content.title: Lost Boundaries
content.description: A fair-skinned African American doctor faces discrimination in 1940s America.

content.title: Love Affair
content.description: A French playboy and an American former nightclub singer fall in love aboard a ship.

content.title: Lying Lips
content.description: A nightclub singer refuses to "date" customers, so she's framed for the murder of her aunt, convicted of the killing and sent to prison.

content.title: Man with the Golden Arm
content.description: A junkie must face his true self to kick his drug addiction.

content.title: Master of the Flying Guillotine
content.description: A vengeful and blind Kung Fu expert travels to a village where a martial arts contest is being held and vows to behead every one armed man he comes across.

content.title: Mr. Mean
content.description: Sent to kill a crime boss in Rome, a hit man becomes a target himself.

content.title: Murder in Harlem
content.description: A black night watchman at a chemical factory finds the body of a murdered white woman. After he reports it, he finds himself accused of the murder.

content.title: Night of the Living Dead
content.description: A group of people trapped in a farmhouse must fight off a horde of flesh-eating zombies.

content.title: One Eyed Jacks
content.description: After successfully robbing a bank in Sonora, Mexico, Dad Longworth abandons his surviving partner, Rio, who is caught and imprisoned by the Mexican Federales.

content.title: Prisoners of the Lost Planet
content.description: Three people are transported into a parallel reality, where they find they must use modern technology, but medieval weapons, in order to save the citizenry from a murderous warlord.

content.title: Red House
content.description: An old man and his sister are concealing a terrible secret from their adopted teen daughter, concerning a hidden abandoned farmhouse, located deep in the woods.

content.title: Scarlett Street
content.description: A man in mid-life crisis befriends a young woman, though her fiancé persuades her to con him out of the fortune they mistakenly assume he possesses.

content.title: Scrooge
content.description: A musical retelling of Charles Dickens' classic novel about an old bitter miser taken on a journey of self-redemption, courtesy of several mysterious Christmas apparitions.

content.title: Sherlock Holmes - Terror By Night
content.description: When the fabled Star of Rhodesia diamond is stolen on a London to Edinburgh train and the son of its owner is murdered, Sherlock Holmes must discover which of his suspicious fellow passengers is responsible.

content.title: Shockproof
content.description: A parole officer falls in love with his client, a ravishing blonde who served time for murder, and he's determined to help her go straight despite her interfering criminal boyfriend.

content.title: Silent Night Bloody Night
content.description: A man inherits a mansion which once was a mental home. He visits the place and begins to investigate some crimes that happened in old times, scaring the people living in the region.

content.title: Snake and Crane Secret
content.description: A martial arts book, which Hsu Yin-Fung carries, is being highly sought by various clans and gangs, but he is in pursuit of someone himself.

content.title: The Chase
content.description: Chuck Scott gets a job as chauffeur to tough guy Eddie Roman; but Chuck's involvement with Eddie's fearful wife becomes a nightmare.

content.title: The Flame
content.description: A woman falls for the victim of an intended blackmail plot.

content.title: The Last Time I Saw Paris
content.description: An American journalist returns to Paris - a city that gave him true love and deep grief.

content.title: The Scarlet Pimpernel
content.description: A noblewoman discovers her husband is The Scarlet Pimpernel, a vigilante who rescues aristocrats from the blade of the guillotine.

content.title: The Screaming Skull
content.description: A newly-wed woman believes the ghost of her husband's deceased first wife is haunting her at an eerie Southern mansion.

content.title: The Steel Claw
content.description: American soldier leads deadly mission into Phillippines to rescue US General held captive by Japanese during WWII.

content.title: The Stranger
content.description: Expensive diamonds are stolen but before the thief can fence them he is strangled by ex-con Cueball, who then takes the gems and continues murdering people he believes are trying to swindle him.

content.title: The Unholy Four
content.description: A man on a fishing trip with three of his friends receives a blow to the head that makes him lose his memory.

content.title: Too Late for Tears
content.description: Through a fluke circumstance, a ruthless woman stumbles across a suitcase filled with $60,000, and is determined to hold onto it even if it means murder.

content.title: Woman on the Run
content.description: Frank Johnson becomes an eyewitness to a murder. He's pursued around San Francisco by his wife, the police, and the killer.
